additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua, Polysorbate-20, Sodium PCA, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Sodium Hyaluronate, Alteromonas Ferment Extract Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Echinacea Extract, Ethanol, Terminalia Ferdinandiana(Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Fruit Extract, Glycerine, Butylene Glycol, Chamomila Recutita (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate.

description: Purify, hydrate and revive your skin with a Little Pot Of Micellar Water. A gentle blend of antioxidant rich Australian Botanicals removes make up and impurities while detoxifying skin. The inclusion of Rose Water protects and nourishes, leaving skin refreshed, hydrated and beautifully clean.
name: Lpo Purify Micellar Water
